answers.answer: Hi,What you have described does not sound like diabetes in regard to symtoms but likely related to anxiety or possibly something neurological. Your blood sugars seem high though, if I understood your readings correctly. I encourage you to seek a doctor's opinion regarding formal testing for diabetes, and more importantly regarding all of your symptoms. It sounds like this is really affecting your life, so it is best you look into it soon.Take care.

question: Hello ,basically im extremely worried,i wake up with extreme numbness in my foot and toes  and sometimes i get sudden numbness in my hand and a weak sensation in my hand.i get sudden jerks in my heart they last for about a second or so but are extremly shocking and painfull and sometimes just general chest discomfort.towards the end of the day i get extremly tierd and i suffer from minor insomia and i get a feeling sometimes that my hand and foot are hot and can litrely feel blood rushing through themi suspected diabetes so i took a blood test 2 times over diffrent intevals to be honest i ate a tiny bit in the 12 hours preceeding these tests but i got a constant 8.2 to 8.1 mmollim only 18 and i dont know what to do, i have no time to go doctors and im not sure if these symptoms are for diabetes or are more serious.please can someone experienced answer me thankyou.kind regards,ahmed
title: Heart pain and numbness
